name: WordSearch Offline
description:
WordSearch is a classic word game! Let go, stop the mind and evacuate ! 😊😄

Look for all the words on the board to win the game and get your reward!

Words grids are generated automatically => Endless puzzles are available for each level of difficulty! 💪💪💪

You can play in "Against the clock" mode or in "Unlimited time" mode !

F̲e̲a̲t̲u̲r̲e̲s̲ :
✅ Attractive design and promoting relaxation 😍🙃😎
✅ Grids generated automatically
✅ Multiple levels of difficulty 💪
✅ Play in limited time or without time limit
✅ Infinity of puzzles for each level
✅ Reverse word selection
✅ Leaderboard for each level of difficulty 🥇🥈🥉
✅ 18 achievements to accomplish 🏆
✅ Multilingual game 😄

If you have suggestions or comments that could improve this application, feel free to contact us! 🗣 Your opinion interests us and we are committed to do our utmost to meet your expectations

C̲o̲n̲t̲a̲c̲t̲ ̲u̲s̲ ! 👍
